敖包.definition: (loanword from Mongolian) road or boundary marker made of piled up earth or stones, formerly worshipped as the dwelling place of spirits

敖廣.definition: Ao Guang, Dragon King of the East Sea, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

敖漢.definition: Aohan banner or Aokhan khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia

敖漢旗.definition: Aohan banner or Aokhan khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia

敖閏.definition: Dragon King of the West Sea, Ao Run, also Ao Ji (敖吉)

敖順.definition: Ao Shun, Dragon King of the North Sea in 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
